data.name: BarnFinders: Amerykan Dream
data.detailed_description:
Check out more our games:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1682320

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1603210/BarnFarm_Renovator/

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1478910/Summer_Camp/


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1554910/BarnFinders_Bid_Wars_DLC/



Welcome to Amerykan Dream!

take a scenic road trip through Ameryka to visit new locations full of new exciting adventures and stuff to loot. We know, if there is one thing that real Barn Finder loves, it’s the new opportunities to gather new items, deliver some new job items and participate in new and exciting auctions. And the Bid Wars? Who doesn’t like some fresh-baked-out-of-the -owen Bid Wars? We know you do! And to give you cherry on top, don’t you want to be able to customize your pawnshop even more? Tired of those old wooden walls that ruin the scenic view? Or maybe you want to have some more fancy-schmancy wallpapers in your own room? Don’t worry - we got you! It’s all here, ready for everyone that wants to come back to Ameryka and explore some more.

Here it is what you will find in our upcoming DLC:


3 brand new maps for you to explore


New Bid Wars - The Goldfish Event!


Plenty of new items to sell, repair, clean and assemble


New pawnshop customization options - customize the outside of your shop, garage and even your own room!


New posters, floors and walls


New gameplay mechanics and many more!

Can’t wait for you to dream with us your own Amerykan Dream!

data.short_description: Take a scenic road trip through Ameryka to visit new locations full of new exciting adventures and stuff to loot
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5 3550 / FX-8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660Ti / R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 21 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 4570 / Ryzen 7 1700x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB / RX 480 GB 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 21 GB available space
